name: Touhou: Wandering Souls
description:
An online platform focused on NetRunner, an out-of-print collectible card game (CCG) designed by Richard Garfield, the creator of Magic: The Gathering. The game took place in the setting for the Cyberpunk 2020 role-playing game (RPG), but it also drew from the broader cyberpunk genre. From the frontpage:

"Welcome to the Runners' Net! This site has the hope to bring back to life NetRunner, one of the more original card games ever printed; we'll try to make players get fun online, and regrowth with time a stronger community.

At this time, NetRunner mailing list has remained one of the few place where players can meet and discuss about the game; through this site, its forum, the IRC chat, a software to play online, and a dedicated server to make connections easier, we will all try to resurrect this great game."
